img.alt: Bellmore-Merrick Central High School District Mission Statement Banner

div.p: The Bellmore-Merrick Central High School District is located on the South Shore of Long Island, New York, serving 7th through 12th-grade students from Bellmore, North Bellmore, Merrick and North Merrick.
